content: CPF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 19 May 2019Will I still earn the extra 1% if the 60k is in SA + MA? Or I have to split into 20k in OA, 40k in SA + MA?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 20 May 2019Yes first 60k is combined balance from all 3 accounts.Only first 20k of the OA will get the bonus 1% applied to it.0 comments1
Siow NanLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 01 Jun 2019Yes. if you have 0 in OA and 60k in MA+SA.  You can collect extra 1% on all 60k.0 comments0
